mdRecord.dcterms:description: built for Brandenburg Elector Friedrich Wilhelm as an orangery, 1685; converted to a horse stable 1714. Expanded by von Knobelsdorff for King Friedrich Wilhelm I, 1746. Used as a museum from 1927; now the Filmmuseum Potsdam. -- https://www.filmmuseum-potsdam.de/Geschichte-index.html [work]
